article_title: Four Israeli soldiers killed by Hezbollah drone attack.
sentence: Four  Israeli  soldiers  killed  by  Hezbollah  drone  attack.

article_title: Four Israeli soldiers killed by Hezbollah drone attack.
sentence: Four  soldiers  were  killed  and  dozens  more  wounded  by  a  drone  strike  on  a  military  base  in  northern  Israel  on  Sunday  night,  the  Israel  Defense  Forces  (IDF)  says.
